content:
Hi. trying to svn-update my local repo, the tortoise says Repository moved temporarily to 'https://gforge.hl7.org/svn/fhir/trunk/build'
I wait it out, or fix whatever-mistake-i-am-making?
I get the same message: svn: E170011: Repository moved temporarily to 'https://gforge.hl7.org/svn/fhir/trunk/build'
yes. it's a gForge problem. I'll ask gForge to look at it urgnetly
